Reno.Sparks High School: Sparks High School is a public high school located at 820 15th Street, Sparks, Nevada, United States. It serves about 1150 students as a member of the Washoe County School District. It is ranked in the top-1000 schools based on the number of AP exams.Its known around the area as the "Railroaders" and has a distinct train whistle when a game is taking place.
